resources.string: Nii Afutu Tsuru St, East Legon, Accra, Ghana

Makedu Consult Limited has expertise in Information Technology solutions. 

We have built a reputation in software development covering a wide range of programming languages and databases. Our end-products include desktop, web-based and mobile applications for international development partners, governmental agencies and the private sector. 

As an IT partner, Makedu’s strength lies in perceiving the client’s business processes, culture, vision and goals across the industry segments. We then formulate client oriented solutions, which are highly reliable.
